related_questions.question: Do marketing jobs pay well?
related_questions.snippet: The Highest Paying Marketing Jobs. ... If you're just getting started in marketing, entry-level marketing positions already have relatively competitive pay: the average base pay for marketing assistants, according to Glassdoor salary data, for example, ranges between $32,000 and $55,000 per year.May 16, 2019
